description: This file sets up an agent with the SerperTools for performing web searches and other related tasks, including example usage for news search, academic paper search, and web scraping.

classes.name: SerperTools
classes.description: A tool class for interacting with the Serper API for search functionalities.

methods.name: Agent
methods.description: Constructor for creating an agent with specified tools and configurations.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Method to print the response of a query, optionally formatted as markdown.
